item.title: Console: end of life versions warnings
item.description:
Earlier this year, we started to show warnings in logs when you deploy PHP applications with a CC_PHP_VERSION corresponding to a release considered as end-of-life by PHP community. Today, we start showing such warnings in the environment variables panel of applications in the Clever Cloud Console for:

  • CC_PHP_VERSION
  • CC_PYTHON_VERSION
  • CC_RUBY_VERSION

Our goal is to better inform our customers about the lifecycle of their ecosystems, and to provide guidance on the proper values to use for the version management of their applications. We’ll extend this to other runtimes in the coming weeks.
